amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriations contained in the bill by $508 million in order to conform the bill with the congressional budget resolution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the overall appropriations in the bill by $508 million, to conform the bill with the provisions of the budget resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 396 - 25 (Roll no. 239).
